explains: n. 繁殖，生育；（动物的）饲养，（植物的）培植；教养
v. 交配繁殖；饲养，培育；养育，培养（breed 的现在分词）
wordGroup: breeding ground 滋生地，繁殖地
livestock breeding 畜牧业，畜牧饲养；家畜繁育
animal breeding 动物育种；家畜育种
breeding season 繁殖期；繁殖季节；生殖季
selective breeding 选择育种；选择性繁殖
cross breeding 杂交育种；杂交繁育

sentences.en: He lived alone, breeding horses and dogs.
sentences.cn: 他独自生活,养殖马和狗。

sentences.en: During the breeding season the birds come ashore.
Warm milk is the ideal breeding ground for bacteria.
sentences.cn: 温牛奶是细菌理想的繁殖地。
